response.original_title: I (a college student) took advantage of the temptation of a cute junior (who has a J* boyfriend) and had sex with all day
response.overview: Yuta, a college student, has long harbored an interest in Mami, but he has always considered her off-limits due to her having a boyfriend.  However, with her graduation soon approaching, Yuta decides to take a chance and invites her out.  Their date takes a swift and unforeseen turn to a love motel, where Yuta soon realizes he underestimated her. As Mami not only takes the initiative but displays a wide variety of moves.
response.title: The Theme Park Is Temporarily Closed... I (a College Student) Took Advantage Of The Temptation Of A Cute Junior (who Has A J* Boyfriend) With Whom I Had No Sex, And Had Sex Over And Over Again Throughout The Day. Mami Mashiro
